SELECT comment.id,comment.bid,comment.content,comment.gmt_create, ruser.id as uid,ruser.username,ruser.avatar, rcomment.id as replyId,rcomment.content as rcontent, rcomment.rid,rcomment.gmt_create as cgmt_create, rcomment.uid as cuid,cuser.nickname as cname,cuser.avatar as cavatar, rcomment.touid as touid,tuser.nickname as tname
FROM red_blog_comment comment LEFT JOIN edu_user ruser on comment.uid = ruser.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT myc.id,myc.content,myc.good,myc.rid,myc.uid,myc.touid,myc.gmt_create,!isnull(cgood.id) as goodc FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY rid ORDER BY gmt_create DESC) rn ,red_blog_comment_reply.* FROM red_blog_comment_reply) t2 WHERE t2.rn < #{size} ) myc LEFT JOIN red_blog_good cgood on myc.uid = cgood.uid and myc.id = cgood.bid and cgood.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY gmt_create,goodc DESC ) as rcomment on rcomment.rid =comment.id
LEFT JOIN edu_user cuser on rcomment.uid = cuser.id LEFT JOIN edu_user tuser on rcomment.touid = tuser.id
WHERE comment.id in ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM red_blog_comment WHERE bid = #{bid}
ORDER BY good DESC
ORDER BY red_blog_comment.gmt_create DESC
LIMIT #{size} ) as subreply )
